channel.title: redteam_infrastructure on khast3x blog
channel.description: Recent content in redteam_infrastructure on khast3x blog

item.title: Payload Delivery for DevOps : Building a Cross-Platform Dropper Using the Genesis Framework, Metasploit and Docker
item.description: Creating a modular, cross-platform payload dropper that checks the OS, and fetches the second stage payload using a single code base!

item.title: Introduction To Modern Routing For Red Team Infrastructure - using Traefik, Metasploit, Covenant and Docker
item.description: Deploy a scalable, dynamically routed Command and Control (C2) infrastructure, spawning additional routes as it grows!

item.title: Hosting and hiding your C2 with Docker and Socat
item.description: Rapidly deliver payloads from your docker-hosted MSF C2, hidden behind socat containers
